resources.string: Don\'t worry, as an Asset Issuer you are able to create them using the Asset Factory. All the assets you published there, will be stored at this wallet.
Don\'t worry, as an Asset User you are able to receive assets from many Asset Owners. You are already eligible to receive them and store them at this wallet.

Don\'t worry, as a redeem point you need to connect your device to other Assets Issuers using the Asset Issuer Community application. Once you are connected, you will be eligible to redeem assets from any user!
Fermat Has detected an exception. Please retry again.
Must be enter the number of assets to deliver
There is not assets to distribute
There is not enought assets to distribute
Are you sure that the entered information is correct? This action is irreversible
Are you sure you want to do this? This action is irreversible
Assets are being delivered. It may take a couple of minutes to confirm or rollback depending on your network connection.
Appropriation of the asset has started successfully. The process will be completed in a couple of minutes.
Welcome to the Asset Issuer Wallet.

You will be using this wallet to store all the assets created with the Asset Factory Application. From here you will be able to distribute them to whom ever uses the Asset User Wallet and get statistics of its usage.
* You will be able to edit your profile in the Asset Issuer Identity application.

This section will show you detailed information of your selected asset.

You will be able to see statistics of its usage, like to which users it has been distributed and much more

You will also be able to deliver the asset to any user you are connected to. If needed, you can appropriate this asset in order to get your bitcoins back.
Users that have decided to appropriate an asset instead of redeem it is also important data.\n\nOn this section, we are showing you those users that have decided to appropriate your selected asset.

On this section you are able to see delivery statistics of your selected asset.\n\nAll the users that have receive this asset will be collected here so you can better define the success of your marketing campaign.
Assets that have been redeemed at redeem points connected to you are a very important data.\n\nWe are collecting those statistics in this section for you to analize it.

On this section you will be able to identify the users you are going to deliver this asset to.

You can deliver as many assets as you have to any connected user.

If no users are available, you will have to connect to them using the User Community application.

You can also deliver your assets to entire groups of users.

If you have many users you are already connected to, it may be better to organize them in groups.

You can accomplish this from the Asset User Community application.

Use this screen to select users that you are connected to.

If no users are available, you need to connect to them from the Asset User Community application.

Use this application to identify and connect to users and they will be permanently available to receive your assets.
